Title: Tech4WPF
Description: Tech4WPF make it easier for developers to create technical applications. You will no longer have to create your own user controlls like knobs, gauges and charts
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Tech4WPF make it easier for developers to create technical applications. You will no longer have to create your own user controlls like knobs, gauges and simple charts. It's developed in C#/WPF. 

This project was inspirated by Qwt - Qt Widgets for Technical Applications http://qwt.sourceforge.net/. It's not port, but similar project, creating controls for technical aplications using .NET framework, WPF and all benefits of this platform like binding etc.

There are three basic controls:
  • Gauge Control
  • Knob Control
  • Chart Control


Tech4WPF was created as a bachelor's thesis at Brno University of Technology, Faculty of Information Technology (Czech Republic).
